message_1: How many geometric isomers are possible for the coordination compound [Co(NH3)4Cl2]+?
message_2:
In the coordination compound [Co(NH3)4Cl2]+, there are two possible geometric isomers: cis and trans.

1. Cis isomer: The two Cl ligands are adjacent to each other on the octahedral complex, with the four NH3 ligands occupying the remaining positions.

2. Trans isomer: The two Cl ligands are opposite each other on the octahedral complex, with the four NH3 ligands occupying the remaining positions.

So, there are 2 geometric isomers possible for the coordination compound [Co(NH3)4Cl2]+.
